jobs.title: IT Support Technician (No Experience Required) - Looking for Students/Starters/Graduates
jobs.description:
For a world leading multinational company, I am currently hiring for a ‘IT Support Technicians’ to work on a 12 month project in Paris, France. FULL TRAINING WILL BE PROVIDED! 

Seats Available: 10

Languages Required: Fluent English

The ideal 'Onsite Support' will need to have the following experience

Must have studied IT or similar
Responsibilities

Rack, Build, cable, configure, and provision Intel and AMD Servers
Rack, cable, and deploy Cisco Layer 2 networking equipment
Troubleshoot, test, quality assurance of Server hardware
Professionally resolve hardware issues via trouble ticket
Willing to work in shifts

Please apply now if you are interested and available. There is ony 1 stage interview!!
